messages.body:
jonathancaru@albawaba.com:


Dearest Lady Agatha Bristol,
Greetings to you in the name of the Lord Jesus, I am sorry for myself that I have lived a life that has left me so empty inside.It is very sad that I don't have loved ones that care enough to carry out my last wishes, and that my health is failing me.We know not what tomorrow brings Although we plan ahead for only  God alone knows The pathway we must tread. We cannot know the future Not one second nor minute or hour each circumstance that we must face...


Lay only in His power.ItÕs vital that we live by faith From minute unto minute and trusting that each step we take He's walking with us in it. We know not what tomorrow brings We cannot see the future Nor the trials we must face  but in all things, God promised us Sufficiency of grace. I will like to put this to you that, after the experience I had with my family, I decided not to trust any one but God, and it is the will of God that I made a random search to seek for a God fearing person, which I found you.


In his sweet, loving hands. You will distribute the funds to any charity organizations of your choice; the lawyer is only going to assist you with his knowledge in getting the funds out from the security company and providing you with the necessary documents to claim the funds with no risk involved, it is 100% risk free.


I am going to write an Application on your behalf to the Finance Company so that they can start processing the donations. You on the otherhand should try and get in touch with my attorney,Barrister Sanjay Khan in INDIA as soon as possible via mail or telephone calls,I am very sick Please send the lawyer direct contact telephone number and fax to enable him open communication with you on how to proceed and secure the funds.


   My relatives aint making things easy for me and i
am getting weaker by
the day.I am just praying and believing on God to
intervene in my
case.Please keep praying for me and do get back to
me when you get
words from the lawyer.


 Hon. hon. sanjay khan
Sanjay Khan & Associates Chambers
22 bandra lane, crossroads complex
Tel:+919833252901,
FaX:+919833252660
Email:sanjay_associateschambers@yahoo.co.in


May God's mercy and blessings be upon your soul.
 Jonathan Caru
messages.raw:
Jonathan Caru

In his sweet, loving hands. You will distribute the funds to any charity organizations of your choice; the lawyer is only going to assist you with his knowledge in getting the funds out from the security company and providing you with the necessary documents to claim the funds with no risk involved, it is 100% risk free.

I am going to write an Application on your behalf to the Finance Company so that they can start processing the donations. You on the otherhand should try and get in touch with my attorney,Barrister Sanjay Khan in INDIA as soon as possible via mail or telephone calls,I am very sick Please send the lawyer direct contact telephone number and fax to enable him open communication with you on how to proceed and secure the funds.

My relatives aint making things easy for me and i am getting weaker by the day.I am just praying and believing on God to intervene in my case.Please keep praying for me and do get back to me when you get words from the lawyer.

Hon. hon. sanjay khan
Sanjay Khan & Associates Chambers
22 bandra lane, crossroads complex
Tel:+919833252901,
FaX:+919833252660
Email:sanjay_associateschambers@yahoo.co.in

May God's mercy and blessings be upon your soul.
Jonathan Caru

messages.body:
May 30


Dear Sir,
Your rather florid prose has left us rather puzzled as
to how we can assist you.


Have you been drinking? 


Yours ever,
Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

  Almighty God guide and protect you through all
your words and thoughts
towards this project commencements and easy
completions.

my condition and
present situations do not allow me drinking or
anyother social activity.


  All i need from you is your trust and sincerity
for this transaction
documents to be prepared by the lawyer and effective
transfer.


  Do ensure you contact the lawyer ASAP so that all
necessary preparations
are made for easy transfer of funds.


  Await your response,
 God Bless you.
 Jonathan Caru

messages.body:
June 3


My dear Caru,


Thank you for your note.


I was merely trying to ascertain that we need some
evidence to support your claims. 


I am Head of Special Operations at Her Majesty's
Foreign Office. We look after Her Majesty's
Government's interests at home and abroad.


That is why we need secrecy, and the need for absolute
confidentiality.


Think about this and get back to me.
messages.raw:

That is why we need secrecy, and the need for absolute confidentiality.

Think about this and get back to me.

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,


Almighty God guide and protect you through all your deeds for the rest of your life.


All my life i have ever dreamed of helping and making sad people putting on a smiling face,propagating and making people to know the right they have in the world.


Hence i have prayed to Almighty God to direct me to whom will help me retrieve these donation  from the company where they have been deposited.


Ensuring all necessary trust and sincerity in you,i would like you to understand that God  watches all your deeds,please let me confide in you to help me carry out this project successfully.


Due to my state of illness, i won't be able to facilitate the runnings and contacts but rather the lawyer will help you in ensuring adequate contact and preparation.


Thanks for your mail,


God bless you and your family.


Jonathan Caru.

messages.body:
June 7

My dear Khan,


Thank you for your note.


As a qualified barrister myself (Miracsky College,
Cambridge) it will expedite matters if we can speak on
a certain professional level. 


Secondly, before we proceed, we should like you to
swear a Temporary Oath of Allegiance to Her Majesty.
Once this is done we can then assess your genuine
intentions and ensure you get what you truly deserve.


Remain blessed, as they say.


Yours ever,
Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
Lady Agatha Bristol

June 7

As a qualified barrister myself (Miracsky College, Cambridge) it will expedite matters if we can speak on a certain professional level.

Secondly, before we proceed, we should like you to swear a Temporary Oath of Allegiance to Her Majesty. Once this is done we can then assess your genuine intentions and ensure you get what you truly deserve.

Remain blessed, as they say.

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha,
   I must express my sincere gratitude, for your
coperation and unlimited effectiveness in replying
my mail.
    I agree with you madam, that professionallism,
being applied will fasten matters in this regard.
   After going through several British Oath of
Allegiance, i wish to inform you that , am ready to
swear by same oath, with all sincerity and
indulgence. I hereby ask you, to send me a copy of
it, by which you wish to see my hand sketched
signature and yours as well, being duly signed and
officiated on the given date of presentation. In
additon to that, you are requested to act fervently,
by providing the necessary documents i asked from
you in my previous mail to you.
    I hereby wish to inform you that on reception of
those mentioned requirements, you will be
jurisdicted to act on behalf of my client Mr. Caru,
as the next of kin/ beneficiary of his estate/assets
here in India, and only here in india, as regards to
my level of service, requested by him.
    Thanking you for your anticipated coperation,
meanwhile, i wish to hear from you soonest , via
email or my private mobile number; +919833252901.
         regards,
    Bar. Sanjay Khan 
   Sanjay khan & Associates
messages.raw:
Barrister Sanjay Khan

Dear Lady Agatha,
I must express my sincere gratitude, for your coperation and unlimited effectiveness in replying my mail.
I agree with you madam, that professionallism, being applied will fasten matters in this regard. After going through several British Oath of Allegiance, i wish to inform you that , am ready to swear by same oath, with all sincerity and indulgence. I hereby ask you, to send me a copy of it, by which you wish to see my hand sketched signature and yours as well, being duly signed and officiated on the given date of presentation. In additon to that, you are requested to act fervently, by providing the necessary documents i asked from you in my previous mail to you.
I hereby wish to inform you that on reception of those mentioned requirements, you will be jurisdicted to act on behalf of my client Mr. Caru, as the next of kin/ beneficiary of his estate/assets here in India, and only here in india, as regards to my level of service, requested by him.
Thanking you for your anticipated coperation, meanwhile, i wish to hear from you soonest , via email or my private mobile number; +919833252901.
regards,
Bar. Sanjay Khan [esq]
Sanjay khan & Associates

Indian telephone number. Shaky writing for an Indian barrister.

messages.body:
June 8


   My dear Khan,
Thank you for your note.


We are delighted that you have agreed to take a
Temporary Oath of Allegiance to Her Majesty.


Please type out the following text, add your
photograph, sign it, and send the document back to me:


'WHEREAS, I Barrister Sanjay Khan, on this
day____________do in all kuzdardz pertaining vas
deferens and in all humble merkin, swear in all fey
gluteus maximus to assist Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth
II in all matters pertaining to Her Royal Business, so
help me God. Pro Vom Poppadom.'


We look forward to a long and fruitful partnership
once we receive your Oath.


Yours ever,


Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
Lady Agatha Bristol

messages.body:
Dear angel
     you should have known that you were dealing
with a biger an d more inteligent young guy. Well i
must thank you for your good work in flushing out
those dumb asses that gets our work messed up with
their little brain. you know this work is meant for
wise and intelligent personals, like me, who has
offered to work with the CIA, and other
international security bodies, but due to their
selfish rascist inhabitations, they turned me down.
So i had to keep on using my intelligence the way it
will bless me. Well , i do suggest that you stop
this your scam o rama work and do real work. we can
work together if you want, and i can make you 100
times richer than you are now.
    Get back to me if you think you can handle. you
can as well callk me on phone.
               THE DON.

messages.body:
June 10


My dear Khan,
Thank you for your spluttering and amusing invective,
which is typical of the 419 scum you are.


Thanks also for the header info on your note. It will
prove useful when the authorities come looking for
you. 


I'm afraid I'll have to turn down your invitation to
involve myself in criminal activity; I rather enjoy my
role in the Foreign Office as well as the benefits
honest employment brings such as regular money and
freedom.


However, I wish you all the worst in your pathetic
endeavours and hopefully your exposure will make
people aware of your revolting and malignant presence
and will see you for the foul, mendacious, stupid and
greedy 419 scammer you are.


One other thing - our operatives and associates are
everywhere, so you never know who'll turn up in your
inbox next.


For now, enjoy your brush with the law, and look
forward to making some new friends soon, you moron. 


Don't pick up the soap, now!


Yours,
Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
Lady Agatha Bristol

June 10

My dear Khan,
Thank you for your spluttering and amusing invective, which is typical of the 419 scum you are.

Thanks also for the header info on your note. It will prove useful when the authorities come looking for you.

I'm afraid I'll have to turn down your invitation to involve myself in criminal activity; I rather enjoy my role in the Foreign Office as well as the benefits honest employment brings such as regular money and freedom.

However, I wish you all the worst in your pathetic endeavours and hopefully your exposure will make people aware of your revolting and malignant presence and will see you for the foul, mendacious, stupid and greedy 419 scammer you are.

One other thing - our operatives and associates are everywhere, so you never know who'll turn up in your inbox next.

For now, enjoy your brush with the law, and look forward to making some new friends soon, you moron.

Don't pick up the soap, now!

Yours,
Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

And where is Our Lad, actually?
Good old APNIC (www.apnic.net) says he's using:
Hathway Cable Service (hathway.net), Mumbai -- for connectivity
and Yahoo India -- for e-mails
But he doesn't seem very Sanjay, or anything east of the Red Sea. Namaste, y'all.

That seemed to be that. But then Agent Stroganov took an interest in this case!

Tel/FAX:+919892433388,+85-2301-58901
                              INDIA. 

    Attn: ,
   Regarding my client who wrote me a mail  that
he
wants you to act as the  Beneficiary of the funds 
he deposited with the Security Company.
  Basically all that i have to do is to act on all

legal matters on behalf of my client and to
prepare 
some documents send to you and the company.This
documents will legally bind you as the new 
beneficiary to the funds.

    Moreso,i am going to write  an application to
the company which my client has  told me he has
also
done.I will prepare and send to you and the
company
the Power of Attorney to enable  you act as the
beneficiary of these funds.I will be also sending
them this Power of attorney to notify them that
the
beneficiaryship has changed.I will be  sending to
you the certificate of deposit the company
presented
to my client when he deposited this funds which
you
will  present to the company for the funds to be
released for you.You will therefore act as the
beneficiary and retrieve  this funds and disburse
as
directed by  my client.

  On the foregoing I will take out time to explain
the whole process to you at different stages.So
for
now,do  furnish me with the following information
to
prepare all the necesary documents for the
project:

1.Your full names as it appears on your
international passport or drivers licence.
 2.Address
 3.Telephone and Fax Numbers
 4.Nationality
 5.Gender
 6.Age
 7.Marital Status
 8.Occupation
 9.Fax to me any vital document for the sake of 
identification i.e your scanned  drivers licence
or 
a  page of your international passport.

  Finally do get back to me as soon as possible
through email or my cell phone number because my
client has complained that his health  fast
deteriorating and he wants to see this project
come
to reality before anything happens to him.

 Regards,

 Barrister Sanjay Khan(Esq)

INDIA.

Attn: ,
Regarding my client who wrote me a mail that he wants you to act as the Beneficiary of the funds he deposited with the Security Company. Basically all that i have to do is to act on all legal matters on behalf of my client and to prepare some documents send to you and the company.This documents will legally bind you as the new beneficiary to the funds.

Moreso,i am going to write an application to the company which my client has told me he has also done.I will prepare and send to you and the company the Power of Attorney to enable you act as the beneficiary of these funds.I will be also sending them this Power of attorney to notify them that the beneficiaryship has changed.I will be sending to you the certificate of deposit the company presented to my client when he deposited this funds which you will present to the company for the funds to be released for you.You will therefore act as the beneficiary and retrieve this funds and disburse as directed by my client.

On the foregoing I will take out time to explain the whole process to you at different stages.So for now,do furnish me with the following information to prepare all the necesary documents for the project:

1.Your full names as it appears on your international passport or drivers licence.
2.Address
3.Telephone and Fax Numbers
4.Nationality
5.Gender
6.Age
7.Marital Status
8.Occupation
9.Fax to me any vital document for the sake of identification i.e your scanned drivers licence or a page of your international passport.

Finally do get back to me as soon as possible through email or my cell phone number because my client has complained that his health fast deteriorating and he wants to see this project come to reality before anything happens to him.

Regards,

Barrister Sanjay Khan(Esq)
